title: Monascus
cleaned_text: National Library of Medicine's controlled vocabulary thesaurus, [MeSH (Medical Subject Headings)](http://www.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/). Descriptors are arranged in a hierarchical structure, which enables searching at various levels of specificity. A genus in the family Monascaceae, order EUROTIALES. One species, Monascus purpureus, has multiple uses in traditional Chinese medicine (MEDICINE, CHINESE TRADITIONAL). Below are MeSH descriptors whose meaning is more general than "Monascus".
